attributes.action: Reform A Level examination time limits.
attributes.additional_details: OCR A Level G151 and G152 exams, for example, work out at 1 mark a minute with no consideration of time to read or time think.
attributes.background: A level examinations are often a test of how quickly a student can write rather than a chance for a student to fairly express their knowledge on a particular subject. This shouldn't be how students are examined.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Exam time limits are the responsibility of exam boards.
